parameters.description: Session type to query, value is 'p2p' or 'dedicated'
parameters.name: session_type

parameters.description: Game mode of the session to query
parameters.name: game_mode

parameters.description: Game version of the session to query
parameters.name: game_version

parameters.description: filter session if joinable or not, accept 'true' or 'false'
parameters.name: joinable

parameters.description: filter session by match existence, accept 'true' or 'false'
parameters.name: match_exist

parameters.description: skip some item(s), offset=3, will skip 3 first items
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: filter session by server status (only for dedicated), accept CREATING,READY,BUSY,REMOVING,UNREACHABLE
parameters.name: server_status

parameters.description: Owner of the P2P session. Dedicated server does not have user_id
parameters.name: user_id

parameters.description: session type to query, accept 'dedicated' or 'p2p'
parameters.name: session_type

200.description: total active session, p2p session will only have 'total' attribute

get.description: Get all active session for custom game, this return only dedicated session type

parameters.description: skip some item(s), offset=3, will skip 3 first items
parameters.name: offset

get.summary: Get all active session for custom game, this return only dedicated session type

get.description: Get all active session for matchmaking game, this return only dedicated session type

parameters.description: skip some item(s), offset=3, will skip 3 first items
parameters.name: offset

get.summary: Get all active session for matchmaking game, this return only dedicated session type

delete.description: Admin delete the session by session ID
delete.summary: Admin delete specified session by session ID

get.description: Get the session by session ID for admin user
get.summary: Admin get specified session by session ID

get.description:
Search sessions. Optimize the query by differentiating query with filter namespace only and filter with namespace & other filter (partyID, userID, matchID).
Query with filter namespace only will not group whole session data while query with filter namespace & other filter will include session data.

parameters.description: Type of the session, value must be 'p2p' or 'dedicated'
parameters.name: sessionType

parameters.description: Status of the session, value must be 'active' or 'deleted'. Only work with p2p session type
parameters.name: status

get.description:
Get session history detailed.

if party_id value empty/null, field will not show in response body.

parameters.description: Session type to query, value is 'p2p' or 'dedicated'

parameters.name: joinable

parameters.name: match_exist

parameters.name: offset

parameters.name: server_status
